idea:
We are engaged in financial inclusion activities i.e., to reach the poorest people living in extremely remote areas of the country by bringing in digital financial solutions.

We endeavor to make financial products and services accessible and affordable to all individuals and businesses, regardless of their geographical location and personal net worth. We strive to remove the barriers that exclude people from participating in the financial sector and using these services to improve their lives to meet their needs – transactions, payments, savings, credit and insurance – delivered in a responsible and sustainable way.
name: Dhan Corporate and Insurance Services LLP

idea:
Real Illusion is Lab Grown Diamond company. Here, we are focused on growing rough diamonds in a lab that a optically and chemically the same as a mined diamond. We have machines that have the ability to grow rough diamonds and we are working on improving our growing processes.
These diamonds are grown in our lab in Jaipur and further cut and polished in Surat. We focus on exporting our polished diamonds, thus bringing in foreign exchange.
name: REAL ILLUSION LLP

idea: We are providing service for Boiler Operation and Manufacturing and supplying Biomass briquettes to the Industries
name: Steamax Solution LLP

idea:
Steadlab Equipment Private Limited is a company incorporated recently under the Companies Act, 2013.


The company is in the business of manufacturing laboratory equipment like humidity chambers, incubators, temperature controlled freezers.


The company aims to innovate in the equipment manufacturing sector by introducing cloud-based technology for monitoring equipment, e-signature facilities for monitoring, use of energy-efficient technologies for manufacturing and running equipment.


Steadlab aims to revolutionise the equipment manufacturing sector by incorporating new-age technology to enable companies to make better use of laboratory equipment.


The company is founded by Nihar Mehta, a young entrepreneur who aims to bring in new cost-saving technologies.
name: STEADLAB EQUIPMENT PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
We help teams of any size manage the entire employee life cycle the easy way. Root ID is a mobile first HRMS with 5 core modules. Applicant tracking system, attendance and leave management, core HR, payroll and performance management.


We cater to organizations with between 10 and a 1000 employees with one or multiple locations.
name: ROOT ID PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: RANGMANCH IS A FIRST EVER IP BASED MARATHI ENTERTAINMENT CHANNEL.
name: NAEN MEDIA HOUSE PVT LTD

idea:
The PrintX is a fast and efficient online solution that provides a one-stop online space for all your printing needs. Whether you need to print thousand copies of your document or a thousand smart cards, we can help.


We provide different online services like Print, Black book services, printing Smart cards, ID cards,

Certificates Printing and many more. We provide a solution that can make your task easier. You just need to download our application and you can use our services from anywhere using your current location/Pin code and can also avail home delivery options from your nearby centre.
name: PrintX

idea: Our mission is to guide your investment for a successful journey. We offer investors micro & macro business opportunities for sustainable, long-term growth and profitability. Bandra West engagement priorities include business investment consulting, manufacturing and global trade.
name: Bandra West Enterprises PVT LTD

idea: CARROCLEAN has been serving Mumbai City since 2021. Founded by Ankish Thorat & Sumit Kulkarni, CARROCLEAN provides Car Detailing Services to Enhance the Aesthetic Beauty Of Your Car. We provide Doorstep Detailing Services & use premium set of products at rates which are unbeatable!
